articles.author: Jon Henley, Michael Savage, James Tapper
articles.title: European lorry drivers ‘will not want to come to UK’, warn haulage chiefs - The Guardian
articles.description: Emergency visa plan will not resolve Britain’s road transport crisis, says industry as majority blame Brexit in poll
articles.content:

articles.title: Man City end Chelsea's unbeaten run as Man Utd pay penalty - SuperSport
articles.description: Manchester City ended their Chelsea hoodoo on Saturday, beating the European champions 1-0 while Bruno Fernandes missed a last-gasp penalty in Manchester United's shock 1-0 Premier League defeat.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Italy recognises Covishield, Indians can get green pass - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: NEW DELHI: Italy has become the latest EU member to recognise WHO-approved Covid-19 vaccine Covishield, after several others like Germany, Switzerland.
articles.content: Italy recognises Covishield, Indians can get green pass
